text: is a Japanese football player. He plays for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Hashimoto was born in Itabashi, Tokyo on August 16, 1993. He joined J1 League club FC Tokyo in 2012. However he could not play at all in the match. In May 2013, he moved to J2 League club Roasso Kumamoto on loan. He played many matches in 2 seasons. In 2015, he returned to Tokyo. In 2019, Tokyo won the 2nd place in the J1 League. He also was selected Best Eleven. In July 2020, he moved to Russian Premier League club Rostov. On March 26, 2019, Hashimoto debuted for the Japan national team against Bolivia. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Updated to 21 January 2024.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社,
